item.title: [pi] Combat [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

The only person iv’e ever even seen perfect combat in is runescape lolz, it is not technically virtually or any other term of impossible, it is 100000000000% impossible because even if you got their source code, it’s not written in java, it’s runescript that compiles itself into java…

which then compiles to binary code for the JVM ( Java Virtual Machine )
i think runescript is just the same as java , i think thats just how they named the source

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Combat [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:5, topic:398874”][quote author=James-RevolutionX link=topic=496012.msg3626625#msg3626625 date=1307881103]

Lol , in order to perfect PI’s combat system you’ll have to re-write the entire CombatAssistant class do you understand why your a retard now?

Completely rework dark bow? what the fuck, why would you mention that, how random. - fix.
[/quote]
He mentioned that because it’s fucking true, look at the dark bow special and the way it attacks, it’s horribly glitched and a waste of space.[/quote]

It can be glitched to use the special attack 2 times without it needing to recharge , furthermore , there are lots of other glitches…
the sgs healing glitch ( not really a glitch but meh )
the entire ranged system is fucking overpowered and some of the mechanics are done just horribly wrong
